mapper.sql: id, created_at, updated_at, cost_record_id, account_name, account_score, detail_score0, detail_score1, detail_score2, detail_score3, detail_score4, user_info_id,cost, register_info_score,identify_info_score,background_info_score, trade_process_score,trade_habit_score,logistics_character_score, account_history_score,activity_score0,activity_score1,activity_score2, account_growup_score,trade_frequency_score,like_info_score
mapper.select: select IFNULL(count(id),0) from detection_account where cost_record_id = #{recordId}
select IFNULL(count(id),0) from detection_account where user_info_id = #{user_info_id}
select IFNULL(count(id),0) from detection_account where user_info_id = #{user_info_id} and account_score >= 80

select * from detection_account where cost_record_id = #{recordId}
and user_info_id = #{user_info_id}
and account_name like "%"#{account_name}"%"
and account_score >= 80
and account_score < 80 and account_score >= 60
and account_score < 60 and account_score >= 0
and account_score = -2
